sentences.en: I outsell all other salesmen for the factory.
sentences.cn: 我为工厂销货比别的推销员都快.

sentences.en: I see her yet; her pretty action did outsell her gift, and yet enriched it too.
sentences.cn: 我现在好像还看得见她当时的样子.她的优美姿态比她这份礼物的价值还大, 同时也使这礼物更加贵重.

sentences.en: It may outsell his previous novels.
sentences.cn: 它的销量有可能超过他以前的几本小说。

sentences.en: Our product outsell theirs by a ratio of two to one.
sentences.cn: 我们的产品比他们的畅销,销售量为他们的二倍.

sentences.en: The company is easily outsell its competitor.
sentences.cn: 公司的销售额轻而易举地超过竞争对手.

sentences.en: The rival companies tried to outsell one another.
sentences.cn: 相互竞争的公司试图比对方销售出更多的货物.

trans.tran_en: to be sold in larger quantities than something else
